page.title: 13SOMERSET COURT
page.content: SOMERSET COURT,SITUATED AT THE EASTERN SIDE OF THE VILLAGE OF BRENT KNOLL,HAS BEEN FOR MANY YEARS.FOR THE PAST TEN YEARS IT HAS BEEN A SCHOOL FOR AUTISTIC YOUNG PEOPLE AND NOW HAS THIRTY TWO RESIDENTS. THE STUDENTS ARE MAINLY HIGHLY INTELLIGENT BUT THEY HAVE DIFFICULTY IN COMMUNICATING.STAFFING IS VERY GOOD,A TOTAL OF THIRTY TWO BEING EMPLOYED IN VARYING CAPACITIES. PRACTICAL ACTIVITIES INCLUDE WEAVING POTTERY,GARDENING PLUS WOODWORKING AND METALWORK. PLANS ARE IN HAND TO INCREASE THE NUMBER OF PLACES AVAILABLE. SOMERSET COURT IS A SEVENTEENTH CENTURY BUILDING WITH EXTENSIVE OUTBUILDINGS AND TWENTY SIX ACRES OF LAND.
